page.title: 08HORTON KIRBY PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content: {Horton Kirby C.of E. (Controlled) {Primary School}serves the villages of Horton Kirby and S. Darenth. The children begin school at 5 years and leave after their 11th birthday. At 11 they transfer to various schools in {Hextable, Swanley}and{Dartford.} There are 237 children on roll at present. A Headteacher and 8 qualified teachers make up the teaching staff. An area Educational Psychologist Reading Centre and Tutorial Unit help with children who are thought to be under-achieving. 5 supervisors provide ancillary help at lunch-times. Meals are cooked on the premises for those children who require them. The 2-storey building, opened in 1965, consists of 8 classrooms, a hall and various offices and ancillary rooms.
